resources.string: select b.id,b.arName name,b.arDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id where b.id=?
select c.id,c.arName name,count(ic.itemId) entities,0 offers from category c left join itemCategory ic on c.id=ic.categoryId where c.id=? group by c.id

select distinct b.id,b.arName name,b.arDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id left join category c on ic.categoryid=c.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? or co.uri like ?) and c.type=1001 AND b.favorite in(1, ?) order by b.rank desc,name,b.id limit ?,? collate nocase

select distinct b.id,b.arName name,b.arDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id left join category c on ic.categoryid=c.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? ) and ic.categoryId=? order by b.rank desc,name,b.id limit ?,? collate nocase

select c.id,c.arName name,count(ic.itemId) entities,0 offers from category c left join itemCategory ic on c.id=ic.categoryId where (c.enName like ? or c.arName like ? or keywords like ?) and type= cast(? as decimal) group by c.id having entities>0 order by count(ic.itemId) desc limit ?,?
select _id,id,uri,arName name from contact where itemid=? order by uri desc
select o.id,o.arName name,o.arDesc desc, o.startDate,o.endDate,o.pages,o.rank from offer o where (o.enName like ? OR o.arName like ? ) limit ?,? collate nocase
select m.id,m.arName name,m.arDesc desc, m.startDate,m.endDate,m.pages,m.rank from menu m where (m.enName like ? OR m.arName like ? ) limit ?,? collate nocase

select distinct b._id,b.id,b.arName name,b.arDesc desc,b.offers,b.favorite,co.uri uri from businessentity b left join itemCategory ic on b.id=ic.itemid left join contact co on b.contactid=co.id left join category c on ic.categoryid=c.id where (b.enName like ? OR b.arName like ? ) and c.type=1001 AND b.favorite=1 limit %1$s,%2$s collate nocase
select c.id,c.arName name, 0 entities,0 offers from category c type=? limit %1$s,%2$s

select c.id id,c.enName name,count(c.id) entities,0 offers from category c, (select ic.categoryId catId from itemCategory ic,offer o where ic.itemid=o.id) o where (c.id=o.catId and (c.enName like ? or c.arName like ? or keywords like ?)) group by c.id limit %1$s,%2$s
